amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: \ SEC. __. Total appropriations made in this Act (other than appropriations required to be made by a provision of law) are hereby reduced by $279,880,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the discretionary funds in the bill by an across-the-board 1 percent.
